thread.section_title: Wellington Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect for Price
thread.title_full: Perfect for Price - Review of Wellington Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: erin2015521
title: Perfect for Price
text: I almost didn't stay here, because some of the reviews were quite negative, but for the price range and location, I was willing to take a chance, and am glad that I did. I travel to NYC frequently, and need to be in the Times Square area, and for the price you will not find many comparable hotels. Yes, the hotel is dated - no shiny new kitchenette or bathroom fixtures - but it is convenient, clean, very roomy for NYC, and the staff is helpful and responsive. I had a deluxe king at the end of one of the corridors, and found the hotel to be quiet, without much noise from the hallway traffic or neighboring rooms. The elevator does take its time, depending on when you are coming/going, but overall was a very nice stay.
